success_probabilities.message: We are very confident you will qualify for this loan.
You will likely qualify for this loan with some restrictions.
reasons: You may have to pay private mortgage insurance (PMI).

success_probabilities.message: You will qualify for this loan with many restrictions.
reasons: You may have to pay private mortgage insurance (PMI).
You may not be eligible for a fixed-rate loan.

success_probabilities.message: You are unlikely to qualify for this loan.
reasons: You will have too much debt relative to your income.
You may not be eligible for a fixed-rate loan.
